_source.short_desc: Elexio is simple, easy to use, and integrated, cloud-enabled church management software. Start your free trial today!
_source.long_desc:
Elexio Community church management software is simple, easy to use, and integrated, giving you a whole church management system at your fingertips.  
-Access church information from any device, anywhere, and at any time.
-Communication with your members via text, email, and voicemail
-Create smart reports and dashboards 
-Leverage automated workflows
-Manage church events and reservations
-Coordinate worship services
-Schedule volunteers
-Gather information through online forms
-And more...
_source.pricing_details: Per user per month basis, contact Elexio for pricing information.
_source.target_audience: Elexio seeks to serve churches that are discleship-driven and outreach-oriented. We service this nation's largest churches, church plants, and everything in between.

category_features.name: Accounts Payable
category_features.definition: Track money owed to a company's creditors/suppliers

category_features.name: Accounts Receivable
category_features.definition: Track outstanding invoices and the money owed from clients

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipment, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Bank Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Compare and match accounting/financial records with corresponding bank statements

category_features.name: Budgeting/Forecasting
category_features.definition: Track actual spending to ensure it's in line with the budget and estimate future finances

category_features.name: Donation Management
category_features.definition: Track/record financial donations made by members, along with the issuance of tax receipts/documents

category_features.name: Fund Accounting
category_features.definition: Manage revenue acquired through grants, donations, and other sources (accountability vs. profitability)

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime. Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful cloud-hosted online accounting software for small businesses. Accessible anytime, anywhere.
related_products.features: Award-winning online accounting software designed for small business owners and accountants. Available on any computer or mobile device with an internet connection. Business finances and cashflow are updated in real time. Imports transactions from bank accounts. Unlimited user logins. Integrates with over 1,000 3rd-party business applications. Supports multiple currencies. Data is accessible through a single ledger, allowing accountants and clients to collaborate around finances.

related_products.short_desc: Wave offers small business owners real double-entry accounting that is integrated with the rest of Wave's solutions, 100% free!
related_products.features: Wave offers 100% free, real double-entry accounting for small businesses. As a cloud-based software, Wave allows you to access your data from anywhere, add unlimited collaborators and work on all of your businesses from a single login. Wave eliminates data-entry and puts the financial reports you need at your fingers tips, allowing you to spend more time doing what you love. Your accounting is also seamlessly integrated with invoicing, receipt scanning, payment processing and payroll.

related_products.short_desc: Church management solution that offers processing donations, managing memberships, planning services, scheduling volunteers, and more.
related_products.features: Planning Center is a set of seven online software products designed to help you find freedom to focus on what matters in your ministry. You can subscribe to individual products, or use them all together as a full church management system. We have tools to help you manage your membership database, schedule volunteers, plan services, check people in, take signups, process online donations, manage your calendar and facilities, and coordinate small groups. Every plan includes full access to support.

related_products.short_desc: User-friendly, powerful church management software with Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting, and Payroll. Desktop and Web!
related_products.features: Church Windows is powerful and flexible yet user-friendly church management software from a well-established leader in the industry. Choose complete integrated packages of Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting and Payroll modules, or begin with one portion and add additional modules later. In addition to the experienced toll-free & online support, we offer free online training classes. Find out why more than 13,000 churches since 1987 see things clearly through Church Windows Software.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: With QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50% on the first three months), you can organize your books, complete tasks that matter faster with automated approvals and reminders, and stay on top of your cash flow all with internal controls through customized roles. With the revenue streams dashboard, you can understand which ministry is strongest and which need help. You can also create board-ready presentations. With 24/7 premium care, get the support you need.

related_products.short_desc: We're the easy-to-use church accounting software that's affordable. See what makes us different.
related_products.features: Our passion is equipping churches to do better ministry. ChurchTrac is a powerful tool that enables you to track your spending, monitor funds, and create budgets to plan for the future. We've included everything you need, including exportable reports, online giving, check printing, memorized transactions, and more. Perhaps our most impressive feature is our price. Create a free account and discover why thousands of churches trust us.

related_products.short_desc: IconCMO offers you anytime, anywhere access to the powerful tools you need to effectively operate a growing and thriving ministry.
related_products.features: IconCMO is designed to help you connect with the congregation while reducing costs associated with traditional software applications. The seamless integration between Membership, Contributions, Fund Accounting, and Member Access modules means you spend less time spent on administrative tasks and more time on what truly matters. IconCMO offers you anytime, anywhere access to the powerful tools you need to effectively operate a growing and thriving ministry. Sign up for a free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Realm integrates basic record keeping into the daily motion of church life to keep your staff equipped and your church body engaged.
related_products.features:
Realm integrates basic record keeping into the daily motion of church life - staff is equipped and your church body engaged.

CHURCH STAFF - Realm simplifies how your staff manages information.
- Track member involvement - Review giving trends - Enter contribution records
- Manage small groups.   

CHURCH BODY - Realm creates new information as people engage online.
- Make online contributions  - Print personal giving statements - Check event schedules
- Update own personal information.

related_products.short_desc: Tithely provides the tools you need to engage with your church online, stay connected, increase generosity, and simplify the lives of y
related_products.features:
Tithely provides the tools you need to engage with your church online, stay connected, increase generosity, and simplify the lives of your staff.

With tools like online giving, text and email messaging, custom church apps and websites, church management software, digital giving, and so much more? it's no wonder why over 37,000 churches in 50 countries trust Tithely to help run their church. 

Learn more about the global leader in church technology at tithely.com.

related_products.short_desc: Aplos makes good stewardship easy with its powerful, all-in-one software suite, engineered specifically for churches.
related_products.features: A fund accounting platform made with church needs in mind, Aplos works with churches of any size to automatically track one-time and recurring gifts, manage the finances of each department, and even track your missions budget or next capital campaign.

similar_products.short_desc: Aplos makes good stewardship easy with its powerful, all-in-one software suite, engineered specifically for churches.

To maintain compliance with accounting standards and keep trust with supporters, it's important for churches to use an accounting solution designed specifically to meet their unique needs. With Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT, you can show stakeholders that you are dedicated to being a good steward of contributed funds and secure the support needed to sustain your mission and expand your outreach.

Accounting/Payroll software integrating financials with tracking of Membership, Attendance, Giving, Events, Facility and Resource Use, secure Check-In/Check-Out, and more. similar_products.short_desc: Subsplash is the only digital ecosystem that combines everything you need to manage and engage your community.
similar_products.features: The Subsplash Platform is more than just a ChMS. It's the only digital ecosystem that combines everything you need to manage and engage your community, including apps, digital giving, web tools, websites, podcasting, live streaming, group communication, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: The PEX Platform combines the ability to establish budgeting controls with feature-rich PEX prepaid Visa Cards.
similar_products.features: PEX provides a safe way for employees and volunteers to make purchases without the use of petty cash or spending money out of pocket.  With the PEX Platform church administrators can establish daily spending limits, transaction limits, specify approved merchant categories and specific vendors.  PEX Visa Prepaid Cards allow your staff to make purchases anywhere Visa is accepted.

similar_products.short_desc: With MoonClerk, youre just 5 minutes away from accepting recurring payments.
similar_products.features: In about 5-10 minutes, MoonClerk allows you to start accepting recurring and payments online or in-person without any programming or implementation costs. MoonClerk works with small businesses and nonprofit in almost any industry. We'd love to have you Explore MoonClerk for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed from the ground up to increase first time givers. Users can round-up everyday transactions to donate to your charity.
similar_products.features: Gyve isn't just another payment processing app. We are a generosity system built on one simple concept; everyone in your organization is at a different place in their generosity journey.  We want to help you encourage each person to take their next steps in giving.  Gyve is the first and only platform offering mobile, online, text-to-give, and round-up donation options.  The most powerful communication tool in the industry, lets organizations target message groups to maximize donor development.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 Accounting Software and Financial Management Solution. Built for Finance by Finance
similar_products.features: Sage Intacct is a preferred provider of cloud financial applications. Specialising in helping churches save money, automate processes, strengthen internal controls, and easily report to multiple stakeholders, Sage Intaccts modern solution and open APIs streamline grant, fund, project, and donor accounting while delivering real-time visibility into the metrics that matter. At Sage Intacct, we help religious organisations grow funding, build influence, and achieve success.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed for churches, ministries, and faith-based organizations to manage events, staff, finances, schedules, volunteers, and more.
similar_products.features:
ACS enables churches to manage groups, events, finances, donor relationships, volunteers, staff, child care, schedules, mailings, reporting, websites, growth strategies, and so much more. Whether online, offline, desktop, or wireless, the tools you need to help you connect your community are totally integrated under one roof!

No matter the size of your church or organization, ACS has the tools to help extend your ministry.

similar_products.short_desc: AccountEdge is powerful, yet affordable, desktop accounting software for your religious organization for Mac or Windows.
similar_products.features:
Accounting Software for Churches, manage your religious organizations? finances and more with AccountEdge. 

AccountEdge Pro is powerful, easy to use, small business accounting software for the Mac and Windows desktop. 

With AccountEdge Pro, religious organizations can manage donations, track expenses, or see your current financial statements. Keep track of fundraising efforts with departmental accounting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting Practice Management software helps professional accountants manage workflow, communicate with their clients, and automate their daily processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Management software handles functions such as accounting, donation tracking, service attendance, membership, schedules and activities. Churches use these applications to automate and organize administrative functions including document creation, outreach and event scheduling. Management software helps churches better track resources and foster communication among administrators as well as staff, ministry leaders, members and visitors. Church Management software is related to Fund Accounting software, Fundraising software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

category_features.name: Accounting Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with a third party accounting system

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Built-in Accounting
category_features.definition: Accounting functionality within the system, not requiring 3rd party assistance

category_features.name: Child Check-in
category_features.definition: Secure process of tracking children during activities

category_features.name: Donation Management
category_features.definition: Track/record financial donations made by members, along with the issuance of tax receipts/documents

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: For Religious Organizations
category_features.definition: Primarily serving churches and religious organizations

category_features.name: Member Communication
category_features.definition: Manage the methods of communicating/engagement (ie. mail, email, SMS, phone calls)

category_features.name: Member Directory
category_features.definition: Online or printable list/directory of members (for external use)

category_features.name: Member Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which members can access/update personal information

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Location
category_features.definition: Organize the operations at multiple locations

category_features.name: Online Calendar
category_features.definition: Online calendar of upcoming events/activities viewable to members and visitors

category_features.name: Online Giving
category_features.definition: Outlet for members and visitors to submit donations electronically

category_features.name: Pledge Management
category_features.definition: Track commitments to donate in the future

category_features.name: Small Group Management
category_features.definition: Organize members and schedule recurring small group meetings

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Website Management
category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: Worship Planning
category_features.definition: Coordinate and schedule the flow of services, plan musical selections, and assign team members

related_products.short_desc: At ChurchTrac, our all-in-one software has all the tools you need built-in, so you can simplify your ministry and save money.
related_products.features:
Most church leaders are DROWNING in a sea of apps to run their ministry. (7 is the average)

They're using applications for things like online giving, mass texting, scheduling, member directories, and more. This gets confusing and expensive!

At ChurchTrac, our all-in-one software has all the tools you need built-in, so you can simplify your ministry and save money.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free church management software. Cloud, mobile, open source.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free online church management software, you'll love Bitrix24. Free for unlimited users, Bitrix24 is a tool of choice by many faith-based and non-profit organizations who have limited funds. More importantly, Bitrix24 has both social tools for engaging your congregation, like social network, user groups, polling, media gallery, shared calendars, video conferencing and business tools like CRM, telephony or project management that help you keep your affair in order.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage contributions, create a website, accept online donations, create reports, send out emails, plan events and more.

In addition to the experienced toll-free & online support, we offer free online training classes. Find out why more than 13,000 churches since 1987 see things clearly through Church Windows Software.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase tithes and offerings with the number 1 online giving and church management system! Rates as low as .5% + .30 a transaction!
similar_products.features: Churches are switching to Continue To Give because our system Increases Giving, and saves you time and money! Our top-rated giving system lets people give when they want, and how they want through options like WEBSITE, TEXT, APP, KIOSK, and more. Don't settle for less. Our complete church management system also makes the back office simple and streamlined.  We have you covered with everything you need like emails, texting, child checking, event tickets, fund accounting, and more.  Signup today!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Accounting software provides ministries specialized tools for church bookkeeping. It can be used for fund accounting, donation tracking, and payroll management. Churches often use accounting software to manage expenses and provide accurate financial reporting for their congregations. Church Accounting software is closely related to Accounting software, and Nonprofit software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.description: Worship software makes planning and running religious meetings easy by automating preparation and coordination efforts of pastors, choirs, music bands, and the congregation.
